translations: n．封锁（复数）：阻止人员、物资进出某地区的行动，通常用于战争或紧急情况。
· The government imposed blockades on the rebel-held areas.
政府对叛军控制的地区实施封锁。
v．封锁（复数）：设立封锁线，阻止人员、物资进出某地区。
· The military blockades the city to prevent the enemy from entering.
军队封锁城市以防止敌人进入。

sentences.sentence: The police set up blockades on highways leading out of the city.
sentences.translation: 警察在城市出口的公路上设下路障。

sentences.sentence: Blockades and skirmishing continued meanwhile, and Grange continued to refortify the castle.
sentences.translation: 与此同时，封锁和小规模冲突继续进行，格兰奇继续加固城堡。

sentences.sentence: The transport of nuclear waste provokes angry blockades;
sentences.translation: 核废料的运输招致民众愤怒的抵制。
